name: Admit source
description: User-defined table indicating from where the patient was admitted

values.definition: Patient referred from clinic or outpatient facility
Patient referred from Health Maintenance Organization
Patient transferred from another acute care hospital

values.description: Transfer from a skilled nursing facility
values.definition: Patient transferred from skilled nursing facility

values.description: Transfer from another health care facility
values.definition: Patient transferred from other healthcare facility
Patient admitted by court order or law enforcement
Admit source information not available or unknown
Patient transferred from critical access hospital

values.description: Transfer from another home health agency
values.definition: Patient transferred from different home health agency

values.description: Readmission to same home health agency
values.definition: Patient readmitted to same home health agency

values.description: Transfer from one distinct unit of the hospital to another distinct unit of the same hospital
values.definition: Internal hospital transfer between distinct units
Patient transferred from ambulatory surgical center

notes: User-defined table based on UB04 Form Locator 15 codes. Values may be customized by organization. In US implementations, should align with Uniform Billing codes.

vendorVariations.epic: Supports standard UB04 codes with organization-specific extensions for internal referrals
vendorVariations.cerner: Uses core admission source values with customizable local codes
vendorVariations.allscripts: Standard UB04 implementation with optional workflow-specific categories
